Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

OOC: Soundwave did not become a good guy just out of the blue.  For your 
information, when he first landed, he was a Predacon, as was Vulois.  He and 
Vulois found the Transmetal 3 driver and became TM3s.  For awhile, Soundwave 
and Vulois were VERY evil. They planned to assasinate Hell Beast and take 
over, if im not mistaken. When they failed at that, Vulois was thought to 
have been killed.  When he resurfaced, Vulois decided to turn over a new leaf 
and be peaceful. Soundwave at first was relectant, but he was loyal to 
Vulois, and soon understood his motivations.  So as you can see, he became 
good because of his best friend.  And another thing, when he was murdered he 
transformed into a totally mechanical tank!  And i ALSO think Bob Skir is a 
moron! Now lets stop arguing here, listen to what The Who said.  Oh, and i 
like your taste in music, Firefox!

--part1_7f.fbac49d.27ae318e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
